mapper.insert: INSERT INTO targetai.STAT_INFO ( END_LOG_DT, BEGIN_LOG_DT ) VALUES ( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:59'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') )

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS BASE_DAY, A.SVC_ID, '#{SEQ}' AS SEQ, A.CNT, '#{BEGIN_LOG_DT}' AS BEGIN_LOG_DT, '#{END_LOG_DT}' AS END_LOG_DT, C.CHANNEL_NM, P.PKG_NM, NOW() AS CREATE_DT FROM ( SELECT SVC_ID, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM targetai.SVCLOG WHERE IO_FLAG = 'OUT' AND CREATE_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '2021-11-15 18:01:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '2021-11-15 18:01:59') GROUP BY SVC_ID ) A LEFT JOIN targetai.SVC S ON (A.SVC_ID = S.SVC_ID) LEFT JOIN targetai.`CHANNEL` C ON (S.CHANNEL_ID = C.CHANNEL_ID) LEFT JOIN targetai.PKG P ON (S.PKG_ID = P.PKG_ID)
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, BEGIN_LOG_DT, END_LOG_DT, IB_APPLY_YN, OB_APPLY_YN, CREATE_DT, MODIFY_DT FROM targetai.STAT_INFO WHERE END_LOG_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:59')
